entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NumericIntPtr tests fail in certain partitioning schemes #63152
  • [LSP] Semantic classification does not work in the interactive window #63148
  • The entire expression is faded when LSP pull diagnostics are on #63147
  • Correctness-determinism failure caused by R2R image of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.InteractiveHost.dll #63145
  • Assertion in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore fails in Interactive Window #63144
  • Binder cycle leads to `NullReferenceException` #63140
    17.4
  • Use keyword color for u8 suffix for UTF8 literals #63139
  • Convert To Record Timeline #63137

Closed

  • EnC: editing around try-catch block in top-level local function does not work #61415
    17.3
  • "Formatting pasted text..." popup not disappearing #63129
  • Implicit interface implementation in derived class fails for embedded interop interface types explicitly implemented by base class #62863
  • using vs. try-finally #63124

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove solution crawler pre-indexing of documents #63153
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/chsienki/test sdk update #63151
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Remove bogus assert around C# import scopes. #63146
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not count a cached solution as causing us to think it is sitll alive on teh host side #63141
    Area-IDE
  • temporarily increase service hub logging to help diagnose servicehub issues #63138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63125
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Select SuggestionItem if there's no match in the list #63123
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add checks to ensure that we don't have any unexpected exceptions corrupting state #63133
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check the right matches in lambdas #63006
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Issue delete and insert edits when changing parameters #62897
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #62854
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix access of a Disposed cancellation token source. #63131
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we don't call out into arbitrary code directly when setting up our cache state #63132
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use snapshot services #63121
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation when computing checksums #63109
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record C# 11 status #63010
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • FindMethodSymbolInType - handle the case when a type definition is resolved to a type in a different module. #62865
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63128
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63127
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify construction of hte RemoteWorkspace #63112
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use ToImmutableAndClear when using a pooled builder with a known length #63110
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63126
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Wait for reverse oop-to-host asset-sync calls to finish before the last oop call returns back to the host. #63122
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #63120
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [WIP] Partition integration tests #63067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Avoid cases in OOP of accessing .Solution.Workspace #63118
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Single-thread crossgen InteractiveHost64 for determinism build #62918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
  • Add IOperation test where IObjectCreationOperation.Constructor is null #63092
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Auto-default ref fields with a null ref-assignment #63065
    Area-Compilers
  • Explore use of compression in sqlite #63111
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow access of .Solution.Workspace in remote scenarios. #63116
    Area-IDE
